labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: false positive nip.io
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

It's dns.adguard-dns.com server

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

nip.io

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Why did `nip.io` domain get blocked? This is a legitimate service providing free DNS records. Now it resolves all subdomains to all-zero record.

```
; <<>> DiG 9.18.15 <<>> @dns.adguard-dns.com +tls nip.io 10.0.0.1.nip.io. 127.0.0.1.nip.io
; (4 servers found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59608
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;nip.io.				IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
nip.io.			3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 156 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:27 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 51

;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44614
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;10.0.0.1.nip.io.		IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
10.0.0.1.nip.io.	3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 160 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:27 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 60

;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8048
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;127.0.0.1.nip.io.		IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
127.0.0.1.nip.io.	3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 160 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:28 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 61
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Не повторяется, но это не раздражитель.
Бесплатное прослушивание музыки имеет свои ограничения, в том числе то, что перечислено в попапе выше и без этого пользователь не узнает, почему внезапно проигрывание трека остановилось.
Можешь добавить правило `music.yandex.*##.crackdown-popup` в пользовательские.
